Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Steam Engine 31 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire-or Water-type move.
1 Flame Body 31 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
18 Steelworker 31 Powers up Steel-type moves.
36 Flash Fire 16 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
54 Rocky Payload 31 Boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
72 White Smoke 60 The Pokémon's white smoke prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
90 Mega Launcher 65 Powers up aura and pulse moves.
100 Poison Heal 79 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 01 Battle Armor 60 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Disc 07 Illuminate 11 Raises the Pokémon's evasiveness.
Disc 12 Sturdy 16 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 13 Cloud Nine 31 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Disc 14 Flash Fire 16 Powers up the Pokémon's Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 18 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 21 Rock Head 14 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 22 Poison Heal 79 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
Disc 44 Magma Armor 11 The Pokémon is covered with hot magma, which prevents it from becoming frostbitten.
Disc 51 Cecity -20 This Pokémon's poor eyesight makes its moves more likely to miss.
Disc 56 Rough Skin 17 This Pokémon inflicts damage with its rough skin to the attacker on contact.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Aftermath 2 Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokémon with a finishing hit.
Bulletproof 14 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Calcifate 68 Normal-type moves become Rock-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Defeatist -17 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Heatproof 7 The heatproof body of the Pokémon halves the damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
Klutz -24 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Mega Launcher 65 Powers up aura and pulse moves.
Predictable -15 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Pressure 14 By putting pressure on the opposing Pokémon, it raises their PP usage.
Purifying Salt 67 The Pokémon's salt protects it from statuses and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.
Rocky Payload 31 Boosts the power of Rock-type moves.
Sand Force 52 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Slow Start -94 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -13 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Steam Engine 31 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat drastically if hit by a Fire-or Water-type move.
Steelworker 31 Powers up Steel-type moves.
Stench 11 By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
Toxic Boost 68 Powers up physical attacks when the Pokémon is poisoned.
Truant -67 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
White Smoke 60 The Pokémon's white smoke prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
Blaze 14 Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Calderize 77 Normal-type moves become Fire-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Flame Body 31 Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
Mimicry 12 Changes the Pokémon's type depending on the terrain.
Huge Power 177 Doubles the Pokémon's Attack stat.
Inflexible -28 This Pokémon can only use the first move it uses in battle.
Motor Drive 17 Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
Volt Absorb 15 Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
